block.p: A picture on Saturday with a capsule analysis of a new television commercial released by Jon S. Corzine, the New Jersey Democratic candidate for United States Senate, was published in error. It showed a scene from a new commercial in support of Mr. Corzine's opponent, Representative Bob Franks. A correction in this space yesterday misidentified the sponsor of the new commercial. It was paid for by the Republican Leadership Council, not by Mr. Franks.

A picture on Saturday with a capsule analysis of a new television commercial released by Jon S. Corzine, the New Jersey Democratic candidate for United States Senate, was published in error. It was paid for by the Republican Leadership Council, not by Mr. Franks.
